dict.acceptation: 自主的；不相关连的；无党派的；不相干的人所做的（或提供的）；
独立自主的人；无党派人士；

sent.orig: Women have four goals: Independent thoughts; Independent ability, Independent in transportation &mobilization; Financially Independent.
sent.trans: 女人要有四立：思想独立，能力独力，交通独立，经济独立。

sent.orig: It will also hire an independent financial adviser to the independent shareholders to provide relevant advice.
sent.trans: 该委员会还将聘请一家独立的财务顾问，为独立股东提供相关的顾问意见。

sent.orig: Each depression, with independent depositional systems, is relatively independent for hydrocarbon formation, migration and accumulation.
sent.trans: 每一个凹陷都有各自独立的沉积体系，是一个相对独立的烃类生成、运移和聚集基本单元。

sent.orig: Jurisprudence is an independent branch of law science with its own knowledge system and independent values.
sent.trans: 法理学是一门独立的法学学科，它有其自身的知识体系和其独立存在的价值。

sent.orig: Sales Forecasting focus on independent demand, and Demand Forecasting cover dependent demand besides independent demand.
sent.trans: 销售预测主要考虑了独立需求，而需求预测既考量了独立需求，又衡量了非独立需求。
